extendedInfo.description: Cineplex Entertainment, Canadaâs largest motion picture exhibitor and SCENE, Canadaâs only entertainment rewards program are now on Android! - Get movie showtimes for every theatre in Canada - Buy tickets for Cineplex theatres with NO additional service fees! - Check your SCENE points balance and add your SCENE card to your phone for an even easier way to earn points - Read the latest Entertainment News and enjoy exclusive trailers, footage and interviews - View theatre information by radius, with maps, phone number, admission prices, showtimes and ticketing information - Search by theatre, movie, actor, news, photos and videos - Available in English & French Try it now! Itâs FREE!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t even listen to its own settings
reviews.comment: The app still downloads and displays notifications when new magazines are available, even when the option to display push notifications has been disabled. uninstalled garbage app
reviews.author: Thomas Bowman

reviews.title: Stop sending me magazine updates
reviews.comment: Even if the notifications setting is off I still get notifications for a magazine I really don\'t want. Very annoying...
reviews.author: Daniel Norton

reviews.title: Looooool, bs
reviews.comment: On est o\303\271? \303\207a besoin d\'un redesign asap c\'est quoi la joke? On se croirait sur un iphone, c\'est tr\303\250s laid. Si j\'en avais voulu un, j\'en aurais acheter un. Tr\303\250s tr\303\250s laid et d\303\251\303\247u.
reviews.author: Antoine Gagnon

reviews.title: Warning - big bug on Magazine
reviews.comment: They notify yiu when a magazine is out. I downloaded it, but realize each page gets  saved as a separate album in my picture gallery. So my gallery grew by like 30 albums..... I had to delete each manually.
reviews.author: tina yiu

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Can\'t detect my location anymore and my favourites are missing. I have to search for my city every time and then the favourites show up again. Otherwise I like this app.
reviews.author: Marianne Quat

reviews.title: Seriously needs a ui redesign
reviews.comment: It works but it\'s clunky and slow.
reviews.author: Scott M

reviews.title: Unreliable
reviews.comment: Since the last update the App will not load current theater info. The GPS were able to locate where I am but would say no theater or movie found. Extremely frustrated!
reviews.author: Janice Yeung

reviews.comment: Lost all my settings and all my favorites and cant get them back im very disapointed. This is coming from someone that uses this app a lot
reviews.author: matthew levesque

reviews.title: Annoying notifications
reviews.comment: Do not send notifications if I don\'t want them.  How do I turn this off? I\'m considering uninstalling.
reviews.author: Guillaume Simard

reviews.title: Need to connect timeplay to app
reviews.comment: If you earn scene points in timeplay, they still make you go online and punch in a card number to receive scene points. Everything should be doable through this app.
reviews.author: Marshall Goldfarb

reviews.title: Sercurity/logout
reviews.comment: There should be a logout option so someone doesn\'t use ur scene card account if u lose ur phone or if is stolen. There should be better security.
reviews.author: jennifer palmer

reviews.title: Don\'t install
reviews.comment: Fill up notification don\'t use . bad . better to go from browser
reviews.author: shubham patel

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: This app is very useful. Lots of handy information on it.   However, I just watched a trailer for a new foreign movie on it and it made me sit thru a 20 second trailer for a different movie first. This is garbage.   I\'m trying to determine if I food spend my afternoon at Cineplex
reviews.author: Lincoln Stewart

reviews.title: Movie Lover
reviews.comment: As a movie lover and Scene card holder, this app is perfect for buying tickets ahead of time, checking my points balance, and watching movie trailers. People have complained of magazine issues with the app but on my Android system there has been  no such issues.
reviews.author: Rachel Harrison

reviews.title: Inconsistent
reviews.comment: I have never seen an app crash as much as this one does. One day it works. The next day it does not. There is always an issue. Either it crashes when you first open it. It forgets your favorite cinemas. It crashes. A lot. So frustrating.
reviews.author: Andrew Mack

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: After this update, every time I try opening the app I get an Oreo\302\251 ad and then it freezes :(
reviews.author: lucia mendoza

reviews.title: says its installed...but its not!
reviews.comment: I\'be tried installing this app about 7 times now. The app page says its installed but it never shoes up on my phone or shows being installed. Can\'t rate the all cause I can\'t get it! Maybe the app works just as well
reviews.author: Stacey Balanoff

reviews.title: nice clean app
reviews.comment: Easy to navigate I find, lots of info on New and upcoming movies, but I\'ve gotten advertisements for other movies while I\'m looking at a trailer to the movie I\'m actually interested in? I don\'t need that, that\'s what this whole app is for. Also I\'m not seeing the tell tale buy option for tickets in the app.
reviews.author: Matt Shattock

reviews.title: Permissions and permissions
reviews.comment: I was gonna install it again but: \"Send email to guests without owners knowledge\" What is this?  Anyway, it\'s useful when I don\'t have my scene card.
reviews.author: Francisco Otake

reviews.title: Unimpressed
reviews.comment: Bad user interface - everything is cluttered, and poorly laid out. The application is more of a pain to use. Its nice to have SCENE card barcode (the only reason I gave this two stars...), but beyond that, the app had no redeemable features.  And now the application is sending \"notifications\" - more like advertisements. Un-installed the app as a result, and I have no intention of reloading it. I wouldn\'t recommend this application unless you absolutely have to have access to your SCENE card. Even then, not worth it in my opinion...
reviews.author: Aaron Heinrich
